site.title: Fernando Bouchet | Full Stack Developer
site.description: I'm Fernando Bouchet, a Programming Technician and Computer Science student. I build web applications using technologies like React, Node.js, and databases. I'm currently training in cybersecurity. This portfolio showcases my projects, skills, and education.

about.p2: with a strong academic background, holding a
about.p5: mindset complements my formal education, giving me hands-on experience with modern technologies like React.js, Next.js, Node.js, and Express.js. I'm skilled in managing both SQL and NoSQL databases.
about.p6: I'm currently expanding my backend expertise with Java and Spring Boot to build even more robust and scalable solutions.
